survey_name: Workplace AI Tool Adoption and Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the adoption and satisfaction levels of AI-powered tools in the workplace, identifying pain points and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered tools do you currently use in your daily work?
questions.client_notes: Recommended to use checkboxes for multiple selections. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered tools do you currently use in your daily work?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI tools available in your workplace?
answer_options: Not applicable (do not use AI tools)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected any tool in Q1 (except 'None of the above')
questions.client_notes: Use radio buttons with a clear 5-point Likert scale. Include N/A option for non-users.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI tools available in your workplace?
answer_options: Not applicable (do not use AI tools)
script.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected any tool in Q1 (except 'None of the above')

questions.question_text: What is the primary benefit you experience from using AI tools at work?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Very satisfied' or 'Somewhat satisfied' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' field with open-text option. Randomize option order to reduce bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with open-text follow-up for 'Other'

script.question_text: What is the primary benefit you experience from using AI tools at work?
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Very satisfied' or 'Somewhat satisfied' in Q2

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using AI tools at work? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected any tool in Q1 (except 'None of the above')
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes with 'None' as an explicit option. Allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using AI tools at work? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected any tool in Q1 (except 'None of the above')

questions.question_text: What types of AI tools would you like to see implemented in your workplace that aren't currently available?
questions.client_notes: Open-text field with character limit of 500. Useful for identifying unmet needs.

script.question_text: What types of AI tools would you like to see implemented in your workplace that aren't currently available?

questions.question_text: How adequate was the training provided for AI tools in your workplace?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected any tool in Q1 (except 'None of the above')
questions.client_notes: 5-point scale with explicit 'No training' option. Helps assess training needs.

script.question_text: How adequate was the training provided for AI tools in your workplace?
script.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected any tool in Q1 (except 'None of the above')

questions.question_text: Would you recommend expanding AI tool usage in your workplace?
answer_options: No, unless significant improvements are made
questions.client_notes: 5-point recommendation scale. Helps gauge overall sentiment.

script.question_text: Would you recommend expanding AI tool usage in your workplace?
answer_options: No, unless significant improvements are made
